TopicTitle: I totally had a dream i was an astronaut

Articles.Content: There i was, the first civilian chosen to be an astronaut, for his love of science and humanity. I went shopping into my local corner shop for some McVities chocolate digestives, and pringles, in my astronaut suit. I was so looking forward to munching on my favourite biscuits in 0g. Then i got woke up by my son. It was SO REAL!!!! Has anyone dreamt anything like this before? It was an incredible dream. I shall remember to blame my son for ruining my dream (joke). I swear I was right there on the launch pad.
I've had some weird dreams. They just were weird. I think I once dreamt I was a puma or something. I also suggest this be moved to the Space Lounge or Kerbal Network, not relevant to the game.
True. Sorry for the off topic. I suffer from that nasty depression bug.
As this is not about the game itself, the thread has been moved to the off-topic lounge.
When I was like a liiitle kid, I remember dreaming about being the president of the world, sitting inside a space fighter and fly around fighting space aliens.

Once I had a dream where I was launched to the ISS aboard a Soyuz spacecraft, and did all sorts of experiments on the station, as well as floating around in zero-g. When I woke up, I felt like I was being squished into the bed.
